title: World of Wellness Bazaar at Grand Bazaar NYC
description: A wellness bazaar featuring various vendors at Grand Bazaar NYC.
address: 100 W 77th St at Columbus Ave, UWS

title: The Annual Loisaida Festival
description: A festival celebrating the culture of Loisaida with an opening parade and various activities.
address: Avenue C / Loisaida Avenue between E 5th + E 12th Streets

title: Passport to Taiwan Festival
description: A cultural festival celebrating Taiwanese culture at Union Square North.

title: Dragon Fest Chinese Food + Culture Street Fair: Panda Day Edition
description: A street fair celebrating Chinese food and culture at Astor Place. Free admission (pay-as-you-go).

title: Africa Day Celebration
description: A celebration of African culture at The Plaza at the Africa Center in East Harlem.
address: The Plaza at the Africa Center, East Harlem

title: Film Camera Swap Meet
description: A meet for film camera enthusiasts at Brooklyn Film Camera in East Williamsburg.

title: DanceAfrica Bazaar
description: A bazaar featuring various vendors and performances along Ashland Pl, Lafayette Ave, and St. Felix St surrounding the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
address: Along Ashland Pl, Lafayette Ave, and St. Felix St, Fort Greene

title: 30th Annual Lower East Side Festival of the Arts
description: A festival featuring over 200 performing arts groups, poets, puppeteers, and filmmakers at Theater for the New City.

title: Fleet Week at the Intrepid Museum
description: An annual celebration featuring a free screening of Top Gun, musical performances, and military activities.

title: Jazz + Gin: A Speakeasy Soirée
description: A speakeasy soirée featuring hot jazz, dancing, and cocktails at a former 1920s Brooklyn speakeasy.
address: The Urbane Arts Club, Ditmas Park

title: ¡Vaya! Latin Music Series: Son Del Monte
description: A performance by the 12-piece Cuban charanga ensemble at Lincoln Center’s David Rubenstein Atrium.
address: Lincoln Center’s David Rubenstein Atrium, UWS

title: Legendary Wind Band Composers at Carnegie Hall
description: Wind ensembles performing works by Bernstein, Copland, and others at Carnegie Hall.

title: Bitches Brew Comedy Show
description: A women-produced and-hosted comedy show featuring various performers at Halyards in Gowanus.

title: ALTTV: A ’90s Alternative Music Video Party
description: A dance party featuring ’90s alternative music videos at Bar Freda in Ridgewood.
